name: Where Do These Teams Play? Trivia Quiz | USA | 10 Questions

questions.text: How many teams in the NFL play their home games in the State of New York?
questions.explanation:
1.

	Only the Buffalo Bills actually play in the state of New York, the Giants and Jets both play in New Jersey.

questions.text: What city did the Milwaukee Brewers originate in?
questions.explanation:
Seattle.

	The Milwaukee Brewers started out as the Seattle Pilots in 1969.

questions.text: What city do the Texas Rangers call home?
questions.explanation:
Arlington.

	The Rangers make their home at 'The Ballpark in Arlington'.

questions.text: What team did the original Washington Senators become?
questions.explanation:
Minnesota Twins.

	The Original Senators moved to Minnesota and the second Senators team became the Texas Rangers.

questions.text: What was the name of the former home of the Detroit Pistons?
